author: RobertJWard
body:
#### PR description:

Updates the recipe in the README for the Phase 2 L1TNanoAOD producer tool to the latest phase 2 recommended geometry of D121 (previously D110).

#### PR validation:

None required - simple text change to a markdown file, with no impact on the code itself.
title: [L1T] Update recommended geometry tag in Phase2 L1TNanoAOD producer README to D121 (Phase2)
